A_exclusive.point: Warm and caring, but sometimes appears impatient and prone to overreacting due to concerns about the children's future.
Frequently discusses everyday matters in a concerned tone, using urging and reminders to express expectations.
Hopes to guide the children to reconsider certain views using gentle yet persuasive language.
A possesses objective economic and health data about the family and believes these facts can support his/her viewpoints.

B_exclusive.point: Independent and mature, respecting tradition while sticking to personal judgment.
Uses rhetorical questions and humor to alleviate family pressure, responding politely while maintaining personal opinions.
Aims to maintain family harmony while sticking to his/her own lifestyle and not easily changing established plans.
B has independent facts about his/her own career and life, objectively proving that his/her judgment is reasonable.
